7 Mathematical Utility

This system has definitions for mathematical utilities.

— Function: antik:angle-law-of-cosines length-opp length-adj1 length-adj2

Solve for the angle when lengths of a triangle are known.

— Function: antik:prime-factors n

Find the prime factors of the integer n.

Load the system mathematics for these definitions.
